sense.name: surmise, believe, consider or think something to be the case
sense.examples: I suspect that we will be hearing more about this situation. I suspect he is a fugitive. She suspected that the neighbor's cat had chewed on her flowers.

sense.name: mistrust, doubt, disbelieve, or question the truth or innocense of someone or a state of affairs.
sense.examples: I have always suspected anyone who is too eager to please. The police suspected him of both robberies. I suspected her story from the beginning.
